title: Everything We Know About Simone Bile Husband , Jonathan Owens
body_text:
Simone Biles isnâ€™t afraid to show why sheâ€™s the GOAT, even if it means outcompeting her man, Jonathan Owens.
The seven-time Olympic medalist posted a clip of her Facebook Watch docuseries, Simone vs Herself, featuring a rope-climbing race between herself and her NFL player beau. Although Owens had a head start of over a foot, Biles easily won the race and the coupleâ€™s $50 bet. Biles wrote in the caption: â€œNever underestimate a gymnast ğŸ˜‚ Nothing like a friendly challenge with your boyfriend.â€
Now married, Biles and Owens first made their relationship Instagram official in August 2020, with a simple selfie captioned, â€œItâ€™s just us ğŸ¤.â€ Since then, they have become one of social mediaâ€™s most adorable couples, thanks to their sweet vacation photos, holiday tributes, and matching moments.
Ahead, we break down everything we know about the Chicago Bears safety and his relationship with Biles, from their wedding to their friendly competitions, and everything in between.
He is a safety for the Chicago Bears.
The 28-year-old NFL player grew up in St. Louis, where he started playing football in high school; he played college ball for Missouri Western State University. Owens first joined the NFL in 2018, playing for the Arizona Cardinals, before joining the Houston Texansâ€™ practice squad in 2019; he officially signed with the Texans in 2020. Then he signed with the Green Bay Packers in May 2023, before inking a two-year contract with Chicago a year later.
Owens took time off from training to support Biles at the Paris Olympics.
Ever the supportive partner, Owens took time off from training camp so he could watch Biles compete at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Parisâ€”her third consecutive Olympic Games.
Pro football players are not allowed to take off too much time, especially in the weeks before the regular season begins, but Biles revealed the news in a press conference, saying, â€œThe Bears are actually granting him a couple days off from training camp, so heâ€™ll be there, yes. For just a short time.â€
This marks the first time Owens has been able to watch Biles compete in the Olympics. At her first showing in 2016, the couple was not yet together, and when she returned for the 2020 Summer Olympics (which took place in 2021), spectators were not allowed, due to COVID-19 regulations.
Owens signed a two-year contract with the Bears in March. The teamâ€™s training camp this summer starts on July 23, and the Olympics competitions kick off on the 26th, so he missed a few days of training to see Biles do her thing.
â€œItâ€™s these memories that we make that weâ€™ll never get back, so anytime we can show up for one another in support, we just get super excited because our schedules donâ€™t align that much,â€ Biles said. â€œSo whenever it does, itâ€™s really important for the both of us to show up in support.â€
On July 29, Owens shared a selfie of himself aboard a plane heading to Paris. â€œComing for you baby,â€ he wrote over the picture.
And since then, he has watched his wife win two gold medalsâ€”one with Team USA, and one in the individual all-around finals. â€œAnother one!!!! Youâ€™re so amazing,â€ he wrote on X after her August 1 individual win. He also shared photos taken of him making heart hands to Biles from the stands, as well as shooting photos and videos of her performances.
Biles and Owens battle over whoâ€™s the better athlete.
In December 2023, Biles appeared on Peacockâ€™s 2023 Back That Year Up with Kenan Thompson and Kevin Hart, where she revealed that she and Owens always try to challenge each other athletically.
â€œI think weâ€™re good at our own sports,â€ she said. â€œWeâ€™ve tried to pin each other against on, like, difficulty, ability and all of that stuff. So at the end of the day, gymnastics is harder, if he agrees or not.â€
When Thompson said Bilesâ€™s answer was a â€œpoliticianâ€ response, she added, â€œWe fought over it a couple times, and then we bowed once we got married. We wouldnâ€™t talk about it again, but it keeps coming up every time. But he has done my workout in the gym, and he can barely do it. And I went to their NFL workout and I crushed it.â€ In response, Hart laughed and said, â€œA lot of uppercuts being thrown.â€
Owens proposed to Biles on Valentineâ€™s Day 2022.
The gymnast shared the happy news on Instagram with a photo of the NFL player getting down on one knee in a gazebo. In the picture, Biles wears a leather ruched minidress and black strappy sandals with gold heels.
â€œTHE EASIEST YES,â€ she captioned the sweet snap. â€œI canâ€™t wait to spend forever & ever with you, youâ€™re everything I dreamed of and more! letâ€™s get married FIANCÃ‰ ğŸ’ğŸ¥ºğŸ¥²ğŸ¤ @jowens_3.â€
Owens also shared the proposal to his social media feed. â€œWoke up this morning with a fiancÃ©e ğŸ’â¤ï¸,â€ he captioned the picture. â€œAppreciate my dawg @don_julio314 for helping me set everything up, she really had no clue what was coming ğŸ˜‚ @zofrost you went crazy on this one bro really made the night special ğŸ™ŒğŸ½.â€
Biles and Owens were married on April 22, 2023.
The athletes marked the occasion via Instagram, sharing their gorgeous wedding portraits, taken by Houston-based photographer Rachel Taylor. In the pics, Biles wears a four-tiered white gown featuring a plunging halter neckline and a strappy open back.
â€œI do ğŸ¤ officially owens ğŸ¤,â€ Biles captioned the wedding-day post on Instagram, while Owens commented, â€œWifey got a great ring to it â¤ï¸ğŸ’ First day of forever ğŸ¤ğŸ½.â€
He and Biles are both loving pup parents.
Owens is a devoted dog dad to his bulldog, Zeus. He also runs Zeusâ€™s Instagram, @zeusthebulldog36. The description for Zeusâ€™s Instagram reads, â€œMost energetic English Bulldog youâ€™ve ever met. I love food, chewing on anything i can find, and taking long naps ğŸ¶ son to @jowens_3 Aspiring model.â€
Biles also runs an Instagram for her own French bulldogs, Lilo and Rambo, at @thebilesfrenchies. Biles and Owensâ€™s pups have even made each otherâ€™s feeds, with captions referring to the pups as siblings. (The cutest!)
Owens didnâ€™t recognize Biles at first.
The couple met over social media in March 2020, according to Texas Monthly, but Owens didnâ€™t recognize the Biles from her iconic Instagram at first. â€œI didnâ€™t know who she was,â€ Owens told Texas Monthly. â€œI just hadnâ€™t heard of her, and when I told her that, thatâ€™s one of the things she liked.â€
Owens went into more detail about how Biles impressed him in that episode of Simone vs Herself. â€œHer work ethic was really the first thing that caught my eye. I never really watched gymnastics before I first started talking to her. When I met her, I honestly didnâ€™t know who she was. It was just kind of like, â€˜Oh, sheâ€™s got a lot of followers. You know, she must be pretty good or something.â€™ â€
He continued, â€œThatâ€™s how I would tell people, and theyâ€™re like, â€˜Simone Biles?! You for real, the gymnast?!â€™ And Iâ€™m like, â€˜Man, sheâ€™s good like that?!â€™ Like I didnâ€™t [know].â€
The pandemic gave them the chance to get to know each other.
Both Owens and Biles both had big plans in early 2020, with Owens headed to training camp and Biles expected to compete in the Summer Olympics. When everything was postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic, they had more time for each other, according to Texas Monthly.
Owens said, â€œWe ended up hanging out right before the pandemic. It was one of the few times in her life where everything was just shut off and she couldnâ€™t do anything. So we used it to get to know each otherâ€”really get to know each other. It created our bond and made it stronger. Now Iâ€™m so thankful.â€
Simone says the couple was â€œmeant to be.â€
In the same Simone vs Herself episode, Biles explained how similar she and Owens are. â€œWe vibe on the same level. We have the same kind of humor. Weâ€™re both athletic. Weâ€™re both elite athletes, so we definitely get each other. It was like it was meant to be,â€ she said.
Owens told Texas Monthly that he loves Bilesâ€™s positive personality. â€œHer energy is something. Sheâ€™s always happy, giggly, bubbly. If Iâ€™ve had a tough day at the office, I wouldnâ€™t want to take that home to her. Her personality, man â€¦â€
He continued: â€œThis was a match made in heaven. Thereâ€™s no better person for me. She loves me, sheâ€™s so affectionate. I just love that. And itâ€™s just intoxicating seeing how much work she puts into everything.â€
The two are super supportive of each otherâ€™s athletic careers.
Biles told People that Owens is one of her biggest fans. â€œOh, heâ€™s always so supportive. Even if I wake up in the morning and Iâ€™m like, â€˜Iâ€™m tired, do I have to go,â€™ jokingly, heâ€™s like â€˜Donâ€™t say that! You can do it, this is your dream!â€™ â€
â€œHeâ€™s always, always so helpful and making sure I stay on top of my therapy and all of that. Heâ€™s the best because he also goes through it [as an athlete], so he knows exactly how it is in the process. Itâ€™s been amazing to have him,â€ she continued.
Owens got the chance to cheer on Biles in person as she won her seventh national womenâ€™s title. He posted a sweet pic congratulating Biles, with a caption that read, â€œFirst time getting to watch you compete in person and you didnâ€™t disappoint. Itâ€™s so cool that i get to watch you do what you love, and be the best at that â€¼ï¸ Iâ€™m so proud of you my lil champ ğŸ¥°â¤ï¸ Trials up next and you already know Iâ€™m there!! Love you baby â¤ï¸â¤ï¸.â€
Biles replied in a comment, â€œI love you so much ğŸ¤ Iâ€™m so happy you got to come watch while in the middle of OTAâ€™s ğŸ˜˜ğŸ˜˜ you a real one.â€
Biles also supports Owensâ€™s football career, and attends his football games often. A November 2020 Instagram post shows Biles in Texans gear at the stadium. Her caption reads, â€œyou know where to find me on sundays.â€
Biles called Owens her â€œfavorite personâ€ in a birthday tribute.
Biles didnâ€™t let her preparations for the Tokyo Olympics keep her from celebrating Owensâ€™ 26th birthday. She posted a sweet Instagram tribute July 22, with a slideshow of moments in the coupleâ€™s relationship. â€œHere in Japan it is already my favorite persons birthday ğŸ–¤ HAPPY 26th BIRTHDAY BABE. @jowens_3 I love you so much. Canâ€™t wait to celebrate you when I get home!â€
She continued, â€œThanks for keeping me sane during the craziest times. an ear to vent too, someone to share fun times with and make the best of memories ğŸ–¤ not sure how I got so lucky & what Iâ€™d do without you! But I hope you have the best day ever. Not too much fun without me tho hahaha ğŸ¥ºğŸ¤ğŸ¾ğŸ¤ forever yours, S.â€
Owens commented under the post, â€œThank you so much baby i love you â¤ï¸â¤ï¸.â€
The couple celebrated their one-year anniversary with matching outfits.
Biles took to Instagram to celebrate her one-year anniversary with Owens, posting a sweet pic where the couple wore matching outfits on what appears to be a date night. In the pic, Biles and Owens wear orange shirtsâ€”a T-shirt for Owens and a tube top for Bilesâ€”with distressed light-wash jeans and white sneakers. The gymnast also included a candid caption, in which she noted that the post was coming after their actual anniversary day.
â€œOops I forgot to tell yâ€™all that weâ€™ve been dating for more than a year ğŸ¤ so happy past 1 year to the best thing thatâ€™s ever happened to you: ME ğŸ¤ğŸ¤£,â€ Biles wrote.
Owens left a comment under the post, saying, â€œTime flies when your having fun â¤ï¸ğŸ¤ª To many more with you baby ğŸ¤ğŸ½.â€
